team.title: The Azirona Drift Work Status
team.description: Current projects and status for Alek & Juleah Miller

projects.title: Round Down Card Game

projects.description: Strategic card game featuring innovative mechanics and engaging gameplay.

projects.title: All Things Bright and Beautiful
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Published collection exploring themes of wonder and beauty in everyday life.

projects.title: My Balloons
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Whimsical children's story about joy, sharing, and letting go.

projects.title: Liminal Webcomic

projects.description: Webcomic exploring the spaces between worlds, launched successfully on Webtoon.

projects.title: Flash Fiction Collection
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Four micro-stories exploring technology and nature in the digital southwest.

projects.title: Desert Roads Novel
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Multi-generational story across the American Southwest exploring themes of identity and belonging.

projects.title: Untitled Comic Project
projects.author: Juleah Miller
projects.description: New comic series in early development exploring themes of connection and technology.

projects.title: Interactive Game Narratives
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Narrative design for multiple game projects including dialogue trees and environmental storytelling.

projects.title: Kirbo Test Game
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: PICO-8 test game to demonstrate the web game player functionality.

projects.title: Desert Ambience Collection

projects.title: Interactive Media Soundtracks

projects.title: Collaborative Graphic Novel

projects.description: Full collaboration combining Alek's storytelling with Juleah's visual narrative expertise.

projects.title: The Data Shepherds
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Near-future science fiction about digital preservation specialists in a world of failing technology.

projects.title: Interactive Poetry Collection
projects.author: Alek Miller
projects.description: Web-based poetry with reader interaction and multimedia elements.

projects.title: Art Book Compilation
